data.subject: Face Of Despair (From `I Walk The Line`)
data.lyric:
Fingers callus from the plough wrinkled weather beatin' brow
 Streak of silver in the hair mhm face

data.subject: `Cause I Love You (From `I Walk The Line`)
data.lyric:
I'll sweep out your chimney
 yes and, I will bring you flowers
 yes and, I will do for you
 Most any
